branchCategory.name: ISE40A, Digital Pressure Sensor, 1 Screen 2 Output with Analog, IP65
branchCategory.description: <p>ISE40A is a digital pressure sensor with a 4 digit, 2 color display.  Instantaneous readings are shown in red or green, or shifted from one to the other to alert reaching a target condition.  Switch outputs are also indicated on the display.  Additional functions enhance security, power saving, resolution and stability.  Reduce effort and input errors by copying settings to up to 10 sensors.  Available M12 cable option.  ISE40A is UL/CSA, CE, and RoHS compliant with an IP65 enclosure rating.</p> <p><span style="color: #ff0000;">The ISE40A legacy pressure sensor has been updated.  Please consider the new ISE20B.  Improved features include a new 3-screen, 3-color display and 2 switch outputs plus analog output.</span></p>

breadCrumb.name: ISE40A, Digital Pressure Sensor, 1 Screen 2 Output with Analog, IP65
